title: Nowhere Left to Hide
description: We have nowhere left to hide... ErikTen years of loving her from the shadows wreaked havoc on my heart. Watching her move on nearly destroyed me, but I'd do it all again. I let them go, to save them from the sins of my birthright, but this time, I'm not walking away. I’ll die before I let him touch her. Or my son. It’s time to claim what’s mine.No more hiding. I'm taking back my woman, my kingdom... my life. CaseyNothing will ever be the same, my shattered heart has lost too many pieces. I've spent the last decade becoming someone else, forcing myself to let go of the past.The only man I ever truly loved gave up everything to protect us, and it cost him his life. Now it could cost me mine, when everything I’ve rebuilt comes crashing down. I'm not sure I can survive this again, but fate isn’t finished with me... with us.
author: Kat Mizera
